text: Allahaca jivanna (atmyanna) tyancya mrtyusamayi ani jyanca mrtyu ala nahi tyanna tyancya nidravastheta kabija karuna gheto, maga jyancya mrtyuca adesa dila gela ahe, tyanna to rokhuna gheto ani itara (atmyanna) eka nirdharita veleparyarnta soduna deto. Vicara cintana karanaryansathi yata niscitapane aneka nisanya aheta
